title: 098 - Baboon Bacteria, Bigfoot Identity, and Scottish Scotty
description:
This week, there was some miscommunication between Gerbs and Levi… we’re down to a foursome. Caleb wants to be paired with Bob during a zombie apocalypse. The crew gets a call from Nessy’s handler, Scotty McCracken, via Siri. Tim’s garage is the colon of the house. What IS Bigfoot? Aaaaaand Tim has a big secret.
  
  
 WE HAVE A FACEBOOK PAGE NOW! “Like” us @poddybreak!
